about.title: Let me tell you something of me
about.phrase_1: Hello! How are you? My name is Jesús, and I am a Full Stack developer with experience in developing web applications from scratch to implementation.
about.phrase_2: Thanks to my university education, my focus goes beyond code: I have specialized studies in UX/UI that allow me to create pleasant and intuitive user experiences.
about.phrase_3: In my current role as an Angular Developer, I am dedicated to implementing efficient and attractive solutions for my clients, prioritizing user experience and personalized design.
about.phrase_4: Would you like to know more? Explore my portfolio and projects, and feel free to contact me through the form you'll find a little further down!
